title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not provide the correct answer and/or a valid justification.

  • Less than. Because the Sr(NO 3 ) 2 (aq) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42DB@ solution already contains a common ion, Sr 2+ (aq) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3FD0@ , the solubility of Sr(OH) 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EA2@ will be decreased, resulting in a lower value of [ OH − ] MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D7C@ .

The response provides the correct answer and a valid justification.

  • Less than. Because the Sr(NO 3 ) 2 (aq) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42DB@ solution already contains a common ion, Sr 2+ (aq) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3FD0@ , the solubility of Sr(OH) 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EA2@ will be decreased, resulting in a lower value of [ OH − ] MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D7C@ .
